Github简介

2014年01月10日 盒子 tools Git Github 分布式 Fork 开源

GitHub is a web-based hosting service for projects that use the Gitrevision control system. It is written using Ruby on Rails by Logical Awesome developers Chris Wanstrath, PJ Hyett, and Tom Preston-Werner. GitHub offers both commercial plans and free accounts for open source projects. According to the Git User’s Survey in 2009, GitHub is the most popular Git hosting site.
